wine_label:marginalia: "1/3/54 at Bussaco.  1942 vintage--a half bottle.  Excellent nose + condition.  Some bouquet. Has character + quality. Not quite dry.   81.  This hotel has the best stocks of aged red + white wine under their own labels (back to the 30s) all bottled by themselves.
